name: TapToGo Dragon
description:
Left Mouse click to where you want your Dragon to go. First level avoid the fiery meteors and collect as many gems as you can. Second level try not to let any small meteors get by. Third level get to Dragon Island and avoid cannon balls, ships and arrows.

Android version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.screenactive.taptogodragon
